strings.Value: "Yes, telling the public would do more harm than good. Let's try to solve the problem discreetly to avoid further trouble."
"Concealing this could be disastrous. Better to warn people now then have them discover it on their own later."
"The people have a right to know what threatens them. Spread the information on this event as wide as possible."
"Agreed. My subjects needn't know of this â€” such problems are for rulers to solve."
"Simply dreadful. I'll see to it that this poor man's family receives a pension... Wait, could it be that all of the monsters have appeared in this manner?"
"So that's how the magic beasts have been arriving. I had no idea such spells even existed, let alone that we had enemies powerful enough to use them."
{n}Lander wipes blood from the bottom of his shoe, frowning.{/n} "Disgusting! Well, at least now we know where these monsters have been coming from."
